section.p: The road is nearly blocked by wagons and supply convoys. A troop of soldiers forces its way through the throng - the men bang heads indiscriminately to clear people out of the way. Roll a die.

outcomes.outcome: Banged on the head! Lose 1 Stamina
Mistaken for a beggar - receive from a passing priest

section.p: When you are ready, you can go:

choices.choice: West into the Forest of Larun
